message: The BLM just wants the land to sell it to China for cash.

Yep this is just something extra she could do specifically for other families with a disabled member. That's no bad thing. If I was entitled to DLA for having a disabled son but earnt literally millions and millions of pounds I would donate it to families with more need than I. I actually have a disabled brother and DLA is very strict and they're constantly reviewing it, reducing the amount and trying to take away the help he needs. Therefore I can think of a few families who aren't mega rich who are probably in the same boat as my brother and struggling.

Hitler got in as a """"Nationalist"""". All despots have, and then when they want to conquer the world it's in the name of """"making our country great again"""". History is replete with Trumps. None of the past """"Globalist Presidents"""" (including Reagan) since Hoover have rejected our nations sovereignty, and I find it ironic that the person you expect to lead us past the corporate-political institution is a corporate institution unto himself. The only reason NAFTA works is rich people like Trump, who have taken their manufacturing need and shipped it off to Mexico or China. Remeber his nationalism next time you put on his shirt or hat.
